name: root-html-file
description: The single-spa root config for coexisting-angular-microfrontends

scripts.start-all: concurrently -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgCyan.bold" "cd .. & cd app1 & npm run serve:app1" "cd .. & cd app2 & npm run serve:app2" "cd .. & cd app3 & npm run serve:app3" "npm start"
